  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Jonathan Edwards and the art of persuasion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jonathan Edwards und die kunst von der 
Überzeugung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jonathan Edwards et l'art de la persuasion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jonathan Edwards e a arte do persuasion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jonathan Edwards ed arte di persuasione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μήλο Edwards και η τέχνη της πειθούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jonatán Edwards y el arte de la persuasión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students will study the elements of persuasive writing in Jonathan Edward's "Sinners in the Hands of an Angry God" according to the following criteria: speaker, audience, occasion, and means of persuasion, and then analyze a contemporary piece of writing, such as an advertisement, for similar elements.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion studieren Kursteilnehmer die 
Elemente des überzeugenden Schreibens in Jonathan Edwards "Sinners in
den Händen eines verärgerten Gottes" entsprechend den folgenden 
Kriterien: Sprecher, Publikum, Gelegenheit und Mittel der 
Überzeugung und analysieren dann ein zeitgenössisches Stück 
Schreiben, wie eine Reklameanzeige, für ähnliche Elemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants étudieront les 
éléments de l'écriture persuasive dans Pécheurs Jonathan 
Edouard des "dans les mains de Dieu fâché" selon les critères
suivants : l'orateur, les assistances, l'occasion, et les moyens
de la persuasion, et analysent alors un morceau contemporain 
d'écriture, telle qu'une publicité, pour les éléments semblables.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes estudarão os 
elementos da escrita persuasive Sinners de Jonathan Edward em "nas 
mãos de um deus irritado" de acordo com os seguintes critérios: 
o altofalante, as audiências, a ocasião, e os meios do 
persuasion, e analisam então uma parte contemporary de escrita, tal 
como uma propaganda, para elementos similares.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi studeranno gli 
elementi di scrittura convincente in Sinners Jonathan Edward "nelle 
mani di un dio arrabbiato" secondo i seguenti test di verifica: 
l'altoparlante, i pubblici, l'occasione ed i mezzi di 
persuasione ed allora analizzano una parte contemporanea di scrittura,
quale una pubblicità, per gli elementi simili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές θα μελετήσουν τα 
στοιχεία του πειστικού γραψίματος αμαρτωλούς μήλου Edward 
στους "στα χέρια ενός υ Θεού" σύμφωνα με τα ακόλουθα κριτήρια: 
ο ομιλητής, το ακροατήριο, η περίπτωση, και τα μέσα της 
πειθούς, και αναλύουν έπειτα ένα σύγχρονο κομμάτι του 
γραψίματος, όπως μια διαφήμιση, για τα παρόμοια στοιχεία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes estudiarán los 
elementos de la escritura persuasiva en Sinners de Jonatán Edward "en
las manos de un dios enojado" según los criterios siguientes: 
el locutor, las audiencias, la ocasión, y los medios de la 
persuasión, y entonces analizan un pedazo contemporáneo de 
escritura, tal como un anuncio, para los elementos similares.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
